short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Penetration testing for GenAI Chat apps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ZenGuard AI Red Chrome extension empowers Generative AI developers to enhance the security of their GenAI Chat Applications through comprehensive penetration testing.

With ZenGuard AI Red, you can effortlessly conduct smoke prompt injection attacks on your chat applications and receive reports about their resilience.
